posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhys
Original circa 1888 Old Judge advertising scorecard.  It is trimmed a bit but these usually sell for between $350-$700 otherwise.  Game was between Boston and Philly.  SOLD








Original 1860's Team Silk ribbon from the Erie Baseball Club.  Name of DW Tuttle 1st Base.  These were used essentially as uniforms before teams had their own uniform specs.  Erie was a high level club from the era but I know nothing of this particular player.  Nice condition.  $1500

[IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1189125586.JPG[/IMG] [IMG]http://www.network54.com/Realm/tmp/1189125678.JPG[/IMG]
